snippet: A special election issue of the One-Page Magazine: Christopher Buckley's all-purpose election night speech for either candidate, Douglas Brinkley's take on the Latino vote, Mario Batali's drink suggestions for election night and more.
abstract: A special election issue of the One-Page Magazine: Christopher Buckley's all-purpose election night speech for either candidate, Douglas Brinkley's take on the Latino vote, Mario Batali's drink suggestions for election night and more.

headline.main: The One-Page Magazine's Election Edition (and Birthday!)
